subject.topic: Citizens to Preserve Overton Park v. Volpe

mods.abstract: This is an interview of Mrs. Robert K. Williams. Mrs. Williams speaks on her life and the development of her neighborhood. She extensively mentions the expressway that was planned to be built and the effects from it on her neighborhood. She also elaborates on her life growing up and the multiple changes in the neighborhood since she was young.
